name: learning-web-dev
description: Goal oriented Web Development roadmap that focuses on visible results that you can quickly share with your friends.

scripts.commit: git add . && git commit -m "publish" && git push
scripts.release: npm run clean && yarn && npm run book:install && npm run book:build && npm run commit
scripts.start: npm run clean && yarn && npm run book:install && npm run book:serve

author: Marco Pegoraro
